MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA25  postcode area of Kilbirnie, affecting properties in Bridgend and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:22am. Our engineers have arrived on siteand are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:40am on the 15th of December 2020
